medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed acute onset of nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea yesterday, with multiple episodes. The emesis and diarrhea were non-bloody. He has mild RUQ pain and diffuse abdominal tenderness, having felt generally well for the past few weeks but called a doctor due to feeling incredibly weak.
medical_history.past_medical_history: T cell large granular lymphocytic leukemia with neutropenia, severe pneumonia, BPH, IBS, lactose intolerance, anxiety, chronic neck pain, tonsillectomy, vocal cord polypectomy, pilonidal sinus excision
medical_history.family_history: Unclear, possible history of blood disease. Father died of cardiac disease, mother of old age. No cancer or respiratory disorders.
